snippet.title: Magic Carpet Ride - 2024 Basic 10Liner Contest Entry (Atari 8-bit)
snippet.description:
This is a video of my entry for the 2024 Basic 10Liner Contest, for the PUR-80 category.

This runs in the original Built-In BASICs on Atari XL/XEs.

This video is of it running in Altirra, PAL mode, on an Atari 130XE, with original OS and Basic ROMs.

The source code and more can be found here:
https://bunsen.itch.io/magic-carpet-ride-atari-8-bit-by-eric-carr

Basic10Liner contest:
https://www.homeputerium.de/
